DOC.brief_summary: By using a Rapid Cardiac Evaluation (RACE) pathway in the Emergency Department (ED), the investigators can effectively reduce ED wait times and ED length of stay by decreasing overall hospital admissions and telemetry admissions. In addition, the investigators hypothesize a decrease in mortality of those patients admitted for cardiac evaluation by increasing the patient to health care provider ratio.
DOC.brief_title: Improving the Management of Acute Coronary Syndromes in the Emergency Department
DOC.criteria: Chief complaint of chest pain 35 years old or greater ST elevation MI New Left Bundle Branch Block Admission regardless of test result Leaving ED against medical advice
